uiStrings.helpmarker_CustomResolution: This option will allow selecting a resolution different than the ones available in-game.
uiStrings.helpmarker_CustomResScale: This option will allow upsampling from a lower screen resolution, usually done for performance reasons.
uiStrings.helpmarker_customFOV: This option will allow increasing the FOV during gameplay.
uiStrings.helpmarker_VSync:
This option will enable or disable the enforced vertical sync that the game enforces.

Keep in mind that while disabling VSync may reduce input latency, it can cause screen tearing.
uiStrings.helpmarker_syncInterval:
This option will allow adjusting the Sync Interval when VSync is enabled.

1 = Default VSync behavior

2 = Half refresh rate

3 = 1/3rd refresh rate

4 = Quarter refresh rate.
uiStrings.helpmarker_FramerateCap:
You can adjust the maximum framerate that the game can run at.

Speed related issues with Character movement (in battles) or 2D animations may occur.
uiStrings.helpmarker_ShadowQuality:
This option allows for the adjustment of shadow resolution.

As a result, this option may come with a performance impact when using higher quality presets.

Available options are Very Low (512), Low (1024), Medium (2048), High (4096), Ultra (8192), and Extreme (16384).
uiStrings.helpmarker_SSAO:
This option controls whether or not objects that are occluded from light should behave as such.

Disabling this option may or may not result in improved performance.
uiStrings.helpmarker_SSR:
This option controls whether or not objects in screen space are reflected.

Disabling this option may or may not result in improved performance.
uiStrings.helpmarker_CharacterOutlines:
This option disables character outlines.

Disabling this option may or may not result in improved performance.
uiStrings.helpmarker_GI:
This option controls whether or not bounce lighting should be used.

Disabling this option will likely not improve/worsen performance, so it's mostly up to preference.
uiStrings.helpmarker_DoF:
This option controls whether or not elements on screen should be blurred when not in focus.

Disabling this option may or may not result in improved performance.
uiStrings.helpmarker_TAA:
This option controls whether or not TAA is used.

Disabling may result in more details being clear, but at the cost of edge and specular aliasing.

Disabling this option may or may not result in improved performance.
uiStrings.helpmarker_Foliage:
This option controls whether or not clusters of foliage are rendered.

Disabling this option may or may not result in improved performance.
uiStrings.helpmarker_MotionBlur: This option enables motion blur, which is in the engine, but not used in-game. It helps make running at 30FPS (or anything below 120FPS) more bearable.
uiStrings.helpmarker_ControlType:
This option controls what type of input prompts on game UI elements should appear when using a controller.

Auto will use SteamInput to automatically switch the input prompts based on what controller is being used.
uiStrings.helpmarker_CameraTweaks: This option will improve the vertical clamping range of camera movement.

startupWindowStrings.startupWindowInputPrompt: Press the 'DELETE' key to open the configuration window.
startupWindowStrings.startupWindowCrackWarning: Cracked copies will not receive technical support.

exitWindowStrings.exitTextPrompt:
Quit the game?
Game progress will be lost if you have not saved your game.
